title: Whisky geeks unite, the 2019 Special Releases are here
text:
Whisky geeks assemble: the 2019 Diageo Special Releases are here, and for fans of single malt, this is an annual apogee to get you properly athrill.

As they line up to zap into aficionados glasses, the arrival of these recherché releases inspires as much zeal as that harboured by the sci-fi geeks gazing into the far-away galaxy for an upcoming Star Wars film.

Indeed, the Special Releases represent a true apex in a whisky drinking calendar, and while there are individual rare bottlings for collectors to salivate over throughout the year, in this case we luxuriate in an entire collection of limited-edition single malts.
